title: Utah Fairpark Area Investment and Restoration District Modifications
general_provisions: This bill modifies provisions relating to the Utah Fairpark Area Investment and Restoration District.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms and modifies definitions;<hr><ltbullet>broadens permissible uses for a fair park land lease;<hr><ltbullet>allows for the development and construction of multiple qualified stadiums in the fairpark district with a lower minimum capacity requirement;<hr><ltbullet>modifies taxing authority provisions related to the fairpark district or a host municipality;<hr><ltbullet>modifies land use authority provisions relating to land located within the fairpark district;<hr><ltbullet>enables a public infrastructure district created by the fairpark district to:<hr><ltbullet1>levy property taxes;<hr><ltbullet1>use bond proceeds for the development and maintenance of public utility infrastructure; and<hr><ltbullet1>pay for specified development and improvements;<hr><ltbullet>establishes a process for a member of the fairpark board to annually file a conflict of interest disclosure; <hr><ltbullet>designates the fairpark district as a qualified jurisdiction that can receive tax information from the State Tax Commission; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical changes.

action_history.description: Senate/ received bill from Legislative Research
action_history.owner: Waiting for Introduction in the Senate
